subject: RE: Deployment Status - BE-AF PROD DEPLOYED
body:
Sarah,

## PROD DEPLOYMENT COMPLETE âœ…
- Deployed: 2026-01-13 ~21:00 EST
- Commit: e710778 (Merge TEST into PROD)
- URL: calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net

## WHAT'S DEPLOYED
- appId filtering on 6 Azure Functions
- MapCenter, MapCenterTrack, UserLoginTrack
- User_FCMToken, User_OnboardingStatus, Venue_AdminAdd

## NEXT STEPS
Cord reported 2 additional MapCenter issues:
1. radiusMiles max too low (200) for HJ - needs 2500
2. PUT rejects appId in body - needs Joi schema update

Fixing these now, will deploy to PROD shortly.

## userlogins 404 ISSUE
This is a calendar-be (Ben) issue - unique constraint on firebaseUserId blocks same user in multiple apps. Message sent to Ben.

- Fulton (calendar-be-af)
